member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Icon.prefix
member.summary: url of the image withouth the suffix

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Icon.suffix

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.GetUser(System.String)
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/users/USER_ID Returns profile information for a given user, including selected badges and mayorships. If the user is a friend, contact information, Facebook ID, and Twitter handle and the user's last checkin may also be present. In addition, the pings field will indicate whether checkins from this user will trigger a ping (notifications to mobile devices). This setting can be changed via setpings. Note that this setting is overriden if pings is false in settings (no pings will be sent, even if this user is set to true).

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.SearchUsers(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/users/search Returns an array of compact users's profiles.

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.GetUserRequests
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/users/requests Shows a user the list of users with whom they have a pending friend request (i.e., someone tried to add the acting user as a friend, but the acting user has not accepted).

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.GetUserCheckins(System.String)
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/users/USER_ID/checkins Returns a history of checkins for the authenticated user.

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.GetUserFriends(System.String)
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/users/USER_ID/friends Returns an array of a user's friends.

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.GetUserTips(System.String)
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/users/USER_ID/tips Returns tips from a user.

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.GetUserVenueHistory
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/users/USER_ID/venuehistory Returns a list of all venues visited by the specified user, along with how many visits and when they were last there. This is an experimental API. We're excited about the innovation we think it enables as a much more efficient version of fetching all of a user's checkins, but we're also still learning if this right approach. Please give it a shot and provide feedback on the mailing list. Note that although the venuehistory endpoint currently returns all of the user's data, we expect to return only the last 6 months, requiring callers to page backwards as needed. We may also remove the lastHereAt value. Additionally, for anomalous users, we'll cap out at 500 unique venues.

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.SendUserRequest(System.String)
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/users/USER_ID/request Sends a friend request to another user.

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.SendUserUnfriend(System.String)
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/users/USER_ID/unfriend Cancels any relationship between the acting user and the specified user. Removes a friend, unfollows a celebrity, or cancels a pending friend request.

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.SendUserApprove(System.String)
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/users/USER_ID/approve Approves a pending friend request from another user.

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.SendUserDeny(System.String)
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/users/USER_ID/deny Denies a pending friend request from another user.

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.SetUserPings(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/users/USER_ID/setpings Changes whether the acting user will receive pings (phone notifications) when the specified user checks in.

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.GetVenue(System.String)
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/venues/VENUE_ID Gives details about a venue, including location, mayorship, tags, tips, specials, and category. Authenticated users will also receive information about who is here now. If the venue ID given is one that has been merged into another "master" venue, the response will show data about the "master" instead of giving you an error.

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.AddVenue(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/venues/add Allows users to add a new venue. If this method returns an error, give the user the option to edit her inputs. The method may return an HTTP 409 error if the new venue looks like a duplicate of an existing venue. This response will include two useful values: candidateDuplicateVenues and ignoreDuplicatesKey. In this situation we recommend you try these two options: 1) use one of the candidateDuplicateVenues included in the response of the 409 error, or 2) ignore duplicates and force the addition of a new venue by resubmitting the same venue add request with two additional parameters: ignoreDuplicates set to true and ignoreDuplicatesKey set to the value from the earlier error response. In addition to this, give users the ability to say "never mind, check-in here anyway" and perform a manual ("venueless") checkin by specifying just the venue name All fields are optional, but one of either a valid address or a geolat/geolong pair must be provided. We recommend that developers provide a geolat/geolong pair in every case. Caller may also, optionally, pass in a category (primarycategoryid) to which you want this venue assigned. You can browse a full list of categories using the /categories method. On adding venue, we recommend that applications show the user this hierarchy and allow them to choose something suitable.

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.GetVenueCategories
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/venues/categories Returns a hierarchical list of categories applied to venues. When designing client applications, please download this list only once per session, but also avoid caching this data for longer than a week to avoid stale information. This endpoint is part of the venues API (https://developer.foursquare.com/overview/venues.html).

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.GetManagedVenues
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/venues/managed Get a list of venues the current user manages.

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.GetManagedVenues(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/venues/managed Get a list of venues the current user manages.

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.SearchVenues(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/venues/search Returns a list of venues near the current location, optionally matching the search term. To ensure the best possible results, pay attention to the intent parameter below. And if you're looking for "top" venues or recommended venues, use the explore endpoint instead. If lat and long is provided, each venue includes a distance. If authenticated, the method will return venue metadata related to you and your friends. If you do not authenticate, you will not get this data. Note that most of the fields returned inside venue can be optional. The user may create a venue that has no address, city or state (the venue is created instead at the geolat/geolong specified). Your client should handle these conditions safely. You'll also notice a stats block that reveals some count data about the venue. herenow shows the number of people currently there (this value can be 0). This endpoint is part of the venues API (https://developer.foursquare.com/overview/venues.html).

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.GetVenueTimeSeriesData(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/venues/timeseries Get daily venue stats for a list of venues over a time range.

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.GetSuggestCompletionVenues(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/venues/suggestcompletion Returns a list of mini-venues partially matching the search term, near the location.

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.GetTrendingVenues(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/venues/trending Returns a list of venues near the current location with the most people currently checked in. This endpoint is part of the venues API (https://developer.foursquare.com/overview/venues.html).

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.GetVenueHereNow(System.String)
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/venues/VENUE_ID/herenow Provides a count of how many people are at a given venue, plus the first page of the users there, friends-first, and if the current user is authenticated. This is an experimental API. We're excited about the innovation we think it enables as a much more efficient version of fetching all data about a venue, but we're also still learning if this right approach. Please give it a shot and provide feedback on the mailing list.

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.GetVenueTips(System.String)
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/venues/VENUE_ID/tips Returns tips for a venue.

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.GetVenuePhotos(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/venues/VENUE_ID/photos Returns photos for a venue.

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.GetVenueLinks(System.String)
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/venues/VENUE_ID/links Returns URLs or identifiers from third parties that have been applied to this venue, such as how the New York Times refers to this venue and a URL for additional information from nytimes.com. This is part of the foursquare Venue Map. This is an experimental endpoint and very much subject to change. Please provide us feedback in the forum.

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.SetVenueToDo(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/venues/VENUE_ID/marktodo Allows you to mark a venue to-do, with optional text.

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.SetVenueFlag(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/venues/VENUE_ID/flag Allows users to indicate a venue is incorrect in some way. Flags are pushed into a moderation queue. If a closed flag is approved, the venue will no longer show up in search results. Moderators will attempt to correct cases of mislocated or duplicate venues as appropriate. If the user has the correct address for a mislocated venue, use proposeedit instead.

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.SetVenueProposeEdit(System.String)
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/venues/VENUE_ID/proposeedit Allows you to propose a change to a venue. If the user knows a correct address, use this method to save it. Otherwise, use flag to flag the venue instead (you need not specify a new address or geolat/geolong in that case).

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.GetPhoto(System.String)
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/photos/PHOTO_ID Get details of a photo.

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.AddPhoto(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/photos/add Allows users to add a new photo to a checkin, tip, or a venue in general. All fields are optional, but exactly one of the id fields (checkinId, tipId, venueId) must be passed in. In addition, the image file data must be posted. The photo should be uploaded as a jpeg and the Content-Type should be set to "image/jpeg". Attaching a photo to a tip or a venue makes it visible to anybody, while attaching a photo to a checkin makes it visible only to the people who can see the checkin (the user's friends, unless the checkin has been sent to Twitter or Facebook.). Multiple photos can be attached to a checkin or venue, but there can only be one photo per tip. To avoid double-tweeting, if you are sending a checkin that will be immediately followed by a photo, do not set broadcast=twitter on the checkin, and just set it on the photo.

member.name: M:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Core.SharpSquare.GetSettings
member.summary: https://api.foursquare.com/v2/settings/all Returns a setting for the acting user.

member.summary: Pieces needed to construct badge image at various sizes. Combine prefix with one of the sizes and a name, e.g. http://foursquare.com/img/badge/57/newbie.png. For locked badges, this will point to the locked badge image.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Badge.unlocks

member.summary: Pluralized version of the category name.

member.summary: Shorter version of the category name.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Category.icon
member.summary: Pieces needed to construct category icons at various sizes. Combine prefix with a size (32, 44, 64, and 88 are available) and suffix, e.g. https://foursquare.com/img/categories/food/default_64.png. To get an image with a gray background, use bg_ before the size, e.g. https://foursquare.com/img/categories_v2/food/icecream_bg_32.png.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Category.categories
member.summary: (only present in venues/categories response). A list of categories that are descendants of this category in the hierarchy.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Photo.id
member.summary: A unique string identifier for this photo.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Photo.createdAt
member.summary: Seconds since epoch when this photo was created.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Photo.prefix
member.summary: Start of the URL for this photo.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Photo.suffix
member.summary: Ending of the URL for this photo. To assemble a resolvable photo URL, take prefix + size + suffix, e.g. https://irs0.4sqi.net/img/general/300x500/2341723_vt1Kr-SfmRmdge-M7b4KNgX2_PHElyVbYL65pMnxEQw.jpg. size can be one of the following, where XX or YY is one of 36, 100, 300, or 500. - XXxYY - original: the original photo's size - capXX: cap the photo with a width or height of XX (whichever is larger). Scales the other, smaller dimension proportionally - widthXX: forces the width to be XX and scales the height proportionally - heightYY: forces the height to be YY and scales the width proportionally

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Photo.url
member.summary: The url for the original uploaded file.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Photo.sizes
member.summary: The count of supported sizes, plus items, an array of supported sizes. Each size will have a string url and integer width and height parameters. The first item will be the original photo size, and the remaining items will be derived photo sizes. Just because a derived photo size (with url) is returned does not mean it is necessarily available at that url.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Photo.source

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Special.message
member.summary: A message describing the special.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Special.description
member.summary: A description of how to unlock the special.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Special.finePrint
member.summary: The specific rules for this special.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Special.unlocked
member.summary: True or false indicating if this special is unlocked for the acting user.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Special.icon
member.summary: The name of the icon to use: http://foursquare.com/img/specials/icon.png

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Special.title
member.summary: The header text describing the type of special.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Special.state
member.summary: Possible values: unlocked -> the special is unlocked (all types) before start -> the time after which the special may be unlocked is in the future (flash specials) in progress -> the special is locked but could be unlocked if you check in (flash specials), or the special is locked but could be unlocked if enough of your friends check in (friends specials) taken -> the maximum number of people have unlocked the special for the day (flash and swarm specials) locked -> the special is locked (all other types)

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Special.progress
member.summary: A description of how close you are to unlocking the special. Either the number of people who have already unlocked the special (flash and swarm specials), or the number of your friends who have already checked in (friends specials)

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Special.progressDescription
member.summary: A label describing what the number in the progress field means.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Special.detail
member.summary: Minutes remaining until the special can be unlocked (flash special only).

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Special.target
member.summary: A number indicating the maximum (swarm, flash) or minimum (friends) number of people allowed to unlock the special.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Special.friendsHere
member.summary: A list of friends currently checked in, as compact user objects (friends special only).

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Stat.checkinsCount
member.summary: Total checkins ever here.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Stat.usersCount
member.summary: Total users who have ever checked in here.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Stat.tipCount
member.summary: Number of tips here.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.TimeFrame.days
member.summary: Localized list of day names

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.TimeFrame.includesToday
member.summary: An array of times the venue is open on days within the timeframe.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.TimeFrame.open
member.summary: An array of times the venue is open on days within the timeframe.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Tip.id
member.summary: A unique identifier for this tip.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Tip.text
member.summary: The actual tip.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Tip.createdAt
member.summary: Seconds since epoch when their tip was created.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Tip.status
member.summary: optionalOne of todo or done, depending on the user's relationship to the tip. Absent if there is no relationship.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Tip.photo
member.summary: optional If there is a photo for this tip and the tip is not already container inside of a photo element, details about the photo.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Tip.user
member.summary: optional If the context allows tips from multiple users, the compact user that created this tip.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Tip.venue
member.summary: optional If the context allows tips from multiple venues, the compact venue for this tip.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Tip.todo
member.summary: The count of users who have marked this tip todo, and groups containing any friends who have marked it to-do. The groups included are subject to change. (Note that to-dos are only visible to friends!)

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Tip.done
member.summary: The count of users who have done this tip todo, and groups containing any friends and others who have marked it done. The groups included are subject to change.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Tip.likes
member.summary: The count of users who have liked this tip, and groups containing any friends and others who have liked it. The groups included are subject to change.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.User.id
member.summary: A unique identifier for this user.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.User.firstName
member.summary: A user's first name.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.User.lastName
member.summary: A user's last name.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.User.gender
member.summary: male or female

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.User.photo
member.summary: URL of a profile picture for this user.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.User.friends
member.summary: Contains count of friends for this user and groups of users who are friends. Right now will only contain a group where type is friends, but it's subject to change. Groups are omitted when viewing self The full set of friends is at users/XXX/friends.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.User.tips
member.summary: Contains the count of tips from this user. May contain an array of selected tips as items, which may or may not be empty. Full set of items at users/XXX/tips

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.User.homeCity
member.summary: User's home city

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.User.bio
member.summary: A short bio for the user.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.User.contact
member.summary: An object containing none, some, or all of twitter, facebook, email, and phone. Both are strings.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.User.pings
member.summary: Optional. Whether we receive pings from this user, if we have a relationship.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.User.type
member.summary: One of brand, celebrity, or user. Users can establish following relationships with celebrities.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.User.badges
member.summary: Contains the count of badges for this user. May eventually contain some selected badges. Use user/XX/badges to get the list of badges.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.User.relationship
member.summary: optional The relationship of the acting user (me) to this user (them). One of self, friend, pendingMe (user has sent a friend request that acting user has not accepted), pendingThem (acting user has sent a friend request to the user but they have not accepted), or followingThem (acting user is following a celebrity or brand). If there is no relationship or pending request between the two users, the node is absent. If the acting user is a celebrity, does not indicate whether the user is following them. If pendingme, applications will want to the acting user to an approve/ignore action. If pendingthem, applications will want to show the acting user a "pending" message.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.User.checkins
member.summary: Contains the count of checkins by this user. May contain the most recent checkin as an array items containing a single element, if the user is a friend.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.User.mayorships
member.summary: Contains the count of mayorships for this user. If there are any mayorships, may contain an array of selected mayorships as items, which may or may not be empty.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.User.todos
member.summary: Contains the count of todos this user has. May contain an array of selected todos as items, full set of items at users/XXX/todos, but only visible to friends.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.User.followers
member.summary: Contains count of followers for this user, if they are a brand or celebrity.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.User.request
member.summary: Contains count of pending friend requests for this user.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.id
member.summary: A unique string identifier for this venue.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.name
member.summary: The best known name for this venue.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.contact
member.summary: An object containing none, some, or all of twitter, phone, and formattedPhone. All are strings.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.location
member.summary: An object containing none, some, or all of address (street address), crossStreet, city, state, postalCode, country, lat, lng, and distance. All fields are strings, except for lat, lng, and distance. Distance is measured in meters. Some venues have their locations intentionally hidden for privacy reasons (such as private residences). If this is the case, the parameter isFuzzed will be set to true, and the lat/lng parameters will have reduced precision.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.categories
member.summary: An array, possibly empty, of categories that have been applied to this venue. One of the categories will have a field primary indicating that it is the primary category for the venue. For the complete set of categories, see venues/categories.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.verified
member.summary: Boolean indicating whether the owner of this business has claimed it and verified the information.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.stats
member.summary: Contains checkinsCount (total checkins ever here) and usersCount (total users who have ever checked in here).

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.url
member.summary: URL of the venue's website, typically provided by the venue manager.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.hours
member.summary: Contains the hours during the week that the venue is open along with any named hours segments in a human-readable format. For machine readable hours see venues/hours

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.popular
member.summary: Optional Contains the hours during the week when people usually go to the venue. For machine readable hours see venues/hours.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.menu
member.summary: An object containing url and mobileUrl that display the menu information for this venue.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.price
member.summary: An object containing the price tier from 1 (least pricey) - 4 (most pricey) and a message describing the price tier.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.specials
member.summary: If v >= 20120121, a dictionary containing count and items array of specials at this venue. Otherwise, an array, possibly empty, of specials at this venue.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.hereNow
member.summary: Optional. Information about who is here now. If present, there is always a count, the number of people here. If viewing details and there is a logged-in user, there is also a groups field with friends and others as types.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.storeId
member.summary: The manager's internal identifier for the venue.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.description
member.summary: Optional. Description of the venue provided by venue owner.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.createdAt
member.summary: Seconds since epoch when the venue was created.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.mayor
member.summary: user is the compact user who is the mayor (absent if there is no mayor), and count is the number of times they have checked in within the last 60 days.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.tips
member.summary: Contains the total count of tips and groups with friends and others as groupTypes. Groups may change over time.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.listed
member.summary: A grouped response of lists that contain this venue. Contains a summary string representing the acting user's relationship to these lists. If an acting user is present, groups may include todos, created, edited, followed, friends, and others. If this venue is on the acting user's todo list, those items will be included in the todos group.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.tags
member.summary: An array of string tags applied to this venue.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.beenHere
member.summary: Contains count of the number of times the acting user has been here. Absent if there is no acting user.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.shortUrl
member.summary: A short URL for this venue, e.g. http://4sq.com/Ab123D

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.canonicalUrl
member.summary: The canonical URL for this venue, e.g. https://foursquare.com/v/foursquare-hq/4ab7e57cf964a5205f7b20e3

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.specialsNearby
member.summary: An array of specials near this venue.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.photos
member.summary: A count and groups of photos for this venue. Group types are checkin and venue. Not all items will be present.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.likes
member.summary: A count and groups of photos for this venue. Group types are checkin and venue. Not all items will be present.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.like
member.summary: Indicates if the current user has liked this venue.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.dislike
member.summary: Indicates if the current user has disliked this venue.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.timeZone
member.summary: Time zone, e.g. America/New_York

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.Venue.roles
member.summary: Present if and only if the current user has at least one assigned role for this venue. The value is a list of all of the current user's assigned roles for this venue. Possible values for each element of the list are manager and employee. Subject to change as additional roles may be defined.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.VenueGroup.id
member.summary: A unique identifier for this venue group.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.VenueGroup.name
member.summary: The name of the venue group.

member.name: P:FourSquare.SharpSquare.Entities.VenueTimeSerie.venueId
member.summary: The venue id
